views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 10

Add a "Dismiss" button to alerts. Useful when an app uses an alert with no exit to force you out of it, i.e when the app detects you're jailbroken, when the app tells you to update the app or the iOS version to the latest version etc... DOES NOT work yet with UIAlertControllers, just with UIAlertViews. Support MAY come soon.

No options to configure.

No Screenshots for this item.
